I get great evp from basically anything actually.. even with the Olympus=C2=
=A0but since I needed on i wanted to upgrade..anyone ever used the rt evp

=
--- On Mon, 1/10/11, vortex6066 <vortex6066@...> wrote:


From: vo=
rtex6066 <vortex6066@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Another Recorder-=
--Panasonic RR-QR200
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, January 10, =
2011, 3:24 PM


=C2=A0 



I dont know of any specific alternatives to the =
Panasonics.
Ive got a QR100 and 200, but I did buy an Olympus DS-40 a while=
 back. Not as good as the QR's but it does get evps.
A guideline I can sugg=
est is to look for older recorders that dont have USB (earphone jack only, =
like the QR's). The older recorders are more likely to have codecs that are=
 less efficient at conversion, subsequently generate artifacts, and therefo=
re more likely to be better at evp.
Good luck Urs.
JEFF

--- In EVP-ITC@yah=

 almost identical, except it has less memory (recording time).
> JEFF
